mapper.select: select * from fishList where fishName LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into buyList ( buyNum, fishName, buyerId, registDate, uploadDate, deadline, weight, saleStatus, price, successSellerId, buyListComment, location ) values ( #{buyNum.nextval}, #{fishName}, #{buyerId}, #{registDate}, #{uploadDate}, #{deadline}, #{weight}, #{saleStatus}, #{price}, #{successSellerId }, #{buyListComment}, #{location} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM buyList WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM buyList where buyerid = #{id} GROUP BY successsellerId) and successsellerId is not null
select * from BuyList where buyerId = #{buyerId} and saleStatus = 'onSale'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM buyList WHERE buyerId = #{search}
SELECT SUM(price) as price ,fishName FROM buyList where buyerid = #{id} and saleStatus !='onSale' and saleStatus !='refundComplete' group by fishName

select to_char(deadline, 'MM') as fishName, sum(price) as price from buylist where to_char(deadline, 'YYYYMMDD') between sysdate-365 and sysdate and buyerid = #{id} and saleStatus !='onSale' and saleStatus !='refundComplete' group by to_char(deadline, 'MM') order by fishName
